description:
A Tea Club camping trip in the mountains is in order, and Tenma and the gang tag along. When Harima is put on firewood patrol with Yakumo, could he blow his chance to get closer to Tenma than ever before?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: But It`s the Tea Club... / It`s the Tea Club, But... / It`s the Tea Club, So?
Sadoubu na no ni... / Sadoubu dakedo... / Sadoubu dakara...
Teekerhosta huolimatta. / Teekerhon takia. / Siksi teekerho.
Vor dem Tee-Klub... In den Tee-Klub... Aus dem Tee-Klub...
茶道部なのに... / 茶道部だけど... / 茶道部だから...
